name: Ice Age: Collision Course
description: When Scrat's acorn sends an asteroid to Earth, the Herd must find a way to stop the asteroid from hitting Earth with the help of a returning friend.
keywords: meteorite, outer space, unidentified flying object, ice age, prehistoric times

review.author: RECB3
review.heading: A Great Instalment to the Series
review.reviewBody: I enjoyed watching this instalment. It is a great film for everyone to watch. The storyline was strong and carried itself entirely throughout the whole film. The cast selection was absolutely excellent. They committed and connected really well to the storyline and to their respective characters. This instalment has a lot.\n\nThis instalment reveals to all viewers the evolution and growing nature of life that anyone can use. It teaches everyone about multiple aspects of life that anyone can have if they are willing to want it. This is a nice instalment to the series. I believe that the series should have ended with this instalment. Everyone will enjoy this film.
